column1: Individual gas data from FAIR 1.6.2 model data files.
(3) Pre-industrial GHG concentrations in their default units for year 1765, (Source: http://www.pik-potsdam.de/~mmalte/rcps).
(4) Pre-industrial GHG concentrations from AR6 large-ensemble run for FAIRv.1.6.2 (note, using default FAIR value for CO2 concentration since it is sampled as uncertain in AR6)
(5) Radiative efficiences in W/m2/ppb from AR5 WG1 Ch8 SM.

(6) Fractional stratospheric release for ozone depleting substances (Daniel, J. and Velders, G.: A focus on information and options for policymakers, in: Scientific Assessment of Ozone Depletion, WMO, 2011)
(7) Number of bromine atoms in each species.
(8) Number of chlorine atoms in each species.
